snippet.title: The Spirit and the Mouse - Launch Trailer - OUT NOW
snippet.description:
The Spirit and the Mouse is now available now!

Bring kindness and light to the people of Sainte-et-Claire as Lila—a tiny mouse with a big heart! Explore a quaint French village, make electrifying new friends, and do good deeds for those in need in this lush narrative adventure game.

Nintendo Switch
https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/the-spirit-and-the-mouse-switch/
Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1679210/The_Spirit_and_the_Mouse/
Epic Games Store
https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/the-spirit-and-the-mouse-42390b
GOG
https://www.gog.com/en/game/the_spirit_and_the_mouse
itch
https://armor-games-studios.itch.io/the-spirit-and-the-mouse
